item.title: [BBC] Crows Could be the Smartest Animal Other Than Primates
item.description: Crows Could be the Smartest Animal Other Than Primates. Chris Baraniuk. https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20191211-crows-could-be-the-smartest-animal-other-than-primates . Dec 11, 2019. New Caledonian crows make hooked tools from soft twigs to scoop insects out of holes. Other animals that use tools: chimpanzees, parrots, alligators and crabs. The crows found the desired stems even when they had been disguised with leaves from a different plant species. There are anecdotes of crow intelligence too, e.
